titleStmt.title: James F. Robinson, Jr., Receipt to Hannah Hays
CWG13710

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 3

body.p:
No. 22.
The United States, State of Kentucky
To Hannah Hays Dr

p.note:
196
4
784
Approved By order of the Governor
Jno. W Finnell
adjt Genl Ky Vols

body.p: I certify that the above account is correct and just: that the services were rendered as stated; & that they were a necessary for the public service

B. F. Wilson
Quartermaster. of Home Guards -- Under Colnl Pope --
Received at Frankfort Ky the 2d of March 1863, of James F Robinson Jr. Quartermaster U.S. Army Ky Vols the sum of Twenty Dollars, and cents, in full of the above account

No. 22.
No. 106 Abstract B "D" Qr. 186
Hannah Hays
Dollars 20 x/100
Paid 2nd of Mch 1863
Home Gd
11
N A Rapier
J198
